comments.text:
Some antifans have been saying there are similarities or copycat between 
BTS and EXO. Both group are good in their own ways. This MV looks far more 
different than EXO's. In terms of dancing in group, BTS are better in my 
opinion. But in terms of dancing solo, Kai , Sehun, Lay & Xiumin kill it. 
So please don't bash this group just because of EXO, because ARMYS & other 
EXO-L won't like it either. 
SIncerely, 
ARMYs <3﻿
